trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawItem" name="DrawItem" href=""> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il `DrawItem` evento viene generato dai controlli owner draw, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: Contiene tutte le informazioni necessarie per l'utente disegnare l'elemento specificato, l'indice dell'elemento, inclusi il <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>sul quale deve essere eseguito il disegno.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe per il controllo specificato con il tipo di carattere specificato, lo stato, area da disegnare e i limiti da disegnare all'interno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> area su cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> da utilizzare, in genere il controllo padre <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> limiti da disegnare all'interno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> valore di indice dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, foreground color, background color, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe per il controllo specificato con il tipo di carattere specificato, lo stato, colore di primo piano, colore di sfondo, area da disegnare e i limiti da disegnare all'interno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> area su cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to use, usually the parent control's <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> da utilizzare, in genere il controllo padre <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> limiti da disegnare all'interno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> valore di indice dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> informazioni.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: Primo piano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> per disegnare il controllo con.

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: Lo sfondo <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> per disegnare il controllo con.

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il colore di sfondo dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the BackColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se lo stato dell'elemento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, il colore di sfondo è impostato su <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the BackColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se lo stato dell'elemento non è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, la proprietà BackColor è impostata su <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Lo sfondo <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il rettangolo che rappresenta i limiti dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor and with the appropriate color.
trans-unit.target: Disegna lo sfondo all'interno dei limiti specificati nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> costruttore e con il colore appropriato.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the background is drawn with the text highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Se l'elemento che viene disegnata è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, lo sfondo viene disegnato con il testo evidenziato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle within the bounds specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un rettangolo di attivazione all'interno dei limiti specificati nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the focus rectangle is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se l'elemento da disegnare è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, viene disegnato il rettangolo di attivazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di carattere assegnato all'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A suggested <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, usually the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto suggerito <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, in genere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>proprietà del controllo padre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> assegnato all'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il colore di primo piano dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, the ForeColor is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se lo stato dell'elemento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>, il colore primo piano è impostato su <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, the ForeColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se lo stato dell'elemento non è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>, la proprietà ForeColor è impostata su <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Primo piano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'area del grafico su cui disegnare l'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> area su cui disegnare l'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore di indice dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> value of the item being drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A>valore dell'elemento da disegnare in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can return -1 if itemswere removed from the list.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può restituire -1 se itemswere rimosso dall'elenco.

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*> value of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il valore numerico che rappresenta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>valore dell'elemento da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato dell'elemento da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: This property value can be a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: Valore di questa proprietà può essere una combinazione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>i membri dell'enumerazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>

trans-unit.source: The members can be combined by using bitwise operators.
trans-unit.target: I membri possono essere combinati tramite operatori bit per bit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> that represents the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"> </xref> che rappresenta lo stato dell'elemento da disegnare.
